text: John Joseph Ryba Jr. (August 10, 1929January 9, 2021) was an American politician and public administrator. Ryba was a member of the Democratic Party. He was a member of the Wisconsin State Assembly from 1993 to 2003, representing Green Bay. Ryba was born in Chicago, Illinois. Ryba died on January 9, 2021 in De Pere, Wisconsin at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Politicians from Wisconsin Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: John Joseph Ryba
